website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality keyboard that is both efficient and aesthetically pleasing.
pros: Highly responsive with no noticeable delays
We loved that this keyboard came in a protective case for the iPad, but even better, the keyboard is detachable from the case
Both the keys and the case felt durable and well made
Comparable in design to a MacBook Pro keyboard
cons: The groove in the case used to prop up the iPad could be deeper to avoid slipping

customer_reviews.title: My favorite case for my iPad 4
customer_reviews.text: After searching products and pouring over reviews I finally settled in this case + keyboard for my iPad 4. I’ve had it a few months now and I have been very pleased with this purchase. The case is an excellent fit and holds the iPad snugly. The keyboard connected quickly and I haven’t experienced any drops or delays in the connection. As many have noted, the only con is that the groove for holding the tablet up could be deeper so there is occasionally some slipping - but this is very seldom in my usage and not an issue for me. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a well-made, secure case for your iPad 4.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed
customer_reviews.text: The battery failed and the company would not return my inquiries regarding the "warranty." Didn't use the device for a few weeks, then finally discovered that the battery would not hold a charge (a few days after Amazon's 30 day return policy had expired). Followed all the company's procedures in registering the product and submitting problems. Two tries resulted in no contact from the company. Ended up buying another brand and now have a useless piece of junk. I wouldn't deal with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Space bar defective; some keys don't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. The space bar didn't work well. Alpatronix responded well to my request for a replacement. However, the replacement keyboard not only had a space bar that didn't work at all , the Q, A and Z keys didn't work either. At all. Customer service assures me they do a quality control check before shipping, but this seems hard to believe. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schwisow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to add a keyboard to an old iPad
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this product as excellent after replacement for two reasons: 1) It is a fine inexpensive bluetooth keyboard with folder type case for old versions of iPad with a crisp feel and accurate performance; 2) It is backed with excellent support. Even among the best devices there will be one or more delivered that has unacceptable performance and that was the case with the first one received. In addition to good product performance the mark of a company is highest based upon support. I have never experienced better support: friendly, knowledgeable, and committed to providing solution to a problem or prompt replacement. In this case within one day. I am pleased with the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Tiny keys, "F" & "J" key protrusions exist, I can See them, but not feel them
customer_reviews.text: Other than that, seems a competent keyboard. Replacing another, cheap one, keys died. out of warranty. .. This one, has 2 dead keys, chatted w/Amazon Tech(human), Sending new keyboard, arrive tomorrow. I would Much Rather that happen, than to find out After it fails under Stress: (You, And device), No Warranty, Deal with it! New keyboard: All eys work on ipad mini2, and Samsung tv, but CAPS LOCK changes language... This keyboard not Warranted to work on ipad mini2, hoping keyboard works without problems on ipad 2, which IS warranted for keyboard. May 2019 update: keyboard keys failed on replacement within even 10 hours use.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality , but not too heavy, magnets too weak
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very high quality. I assumed it was fake leather but it is real, which I don't like. It makes the ipad very heavy. The keyboard is held magnetically and slides off very easy. This may sound weird but I was hoping for a cheap fake leather with a material inside that the keyboard velcros too like my case for my samsung tablet. It is light, protective, cruelty free, and the velcro works much better than magnets. I guess I didn't read this description well enough before I bought this. It is a good, high quality case, but not for me due to heavy, real leather, magnetic keyboard too easily slides off.
customer_reviews.author: Chili Bean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a student
customer_reviews.text: Got this thinking it was for an iPad 6 but it’s actually for the older generations. HOWEVER I’m a broke college student who can’t afford the appropriate one so I decided to use it anyway and it works great, despite it not fitting right (the iPad 6 is a bit smaller than older generations so you can’t access the front camera when it’s docked). Had no issues with it, it works great so far. Easy to connect with Bluetooth and easy to stand my iPad up.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard has a nice touch and is easy to set up. Since it is not "attached" you can move it around or completely away from the iPad if you want to use the touch screen. This also makes it less like a small computer. The charge seems to last a good while. Recharge is pretty fast. Keyboard works well for me, but I don't have extra big hands/fingers. Would recommend as a very workable keyboard for iPad without spending a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: beachbiker52

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.....
customer_reviews.text: I might upgrade to five stars later. So far, I'm a little clumsy using the case. I thought the keyboard would somehow stay in place better in the position it is in the picture. It seems to slip around when I use it like that. The keyboard is magnetically held in place when you close the case, but not in this position. I like the looks of the case, and the color. It seems a bit more red and not the 'hot pink' pictured. All in all, I'm satisfied with it, and as I use it more it might seem more natural. I do like the touch of the keyboard and the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard quit working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty, but awkward to use and heavy. The Ipad slides around inside the holder, making it difficult to access the home button. The keyboard does connect well and I like that I can turn the battery off. I much preferred my first case, which was lightweight aluminum and much more compact. I don't recommend this product. UPDATE Dec 2017: The keyboard quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: The Keyboard worked fine for the first three weeks and then the numbers ...
customer_reviews.text: The Keyboard worked fine for the first three weeks and then the numbers buttons inexplicably stopped functioning. As far as ergonomic function and ease of use, it met my expectations but to malfunction after such a short period of time I am force to give it a one star due to poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great style and function
customer_reviews.text: This case is elegant yet durable. The magnets that close the case and keep the keyboard in place are strong enough to ensure that things stay in place. The removable keyboard allows you to adjust how far or close the keyboard is to the folding flap of the case while typing. The keyboard's size allows for fat-fingered knuckle-draggers to hit keystrokes with ease. The sleep function preserves battery life when you are busying listening instead of typing. The case keeps the tablet secure when being carried and also allows for optimum positioning when typing. All in all, a great buy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Keys do not work!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift that lasted approximately 6 months. I loved it up until the moment it stopped working. The "y" and the "t" no longer work making the keyboard virtually unusable. Very sad about the product. Nice cover though.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn H.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Not only substandard QUALITY (in my opinion) but service or support is very slow and difficult or non responsive. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit ipad 4.  a1458
customer_reviews.text: Should be a disclaimer that it does not support a1458, its too small for that IPAD model. This is not the first time this happened, there are several ipad covers out there that do not fit ipad 4 a1458 model. its a 9.7 inch screen however has a larger border around the screen, this is where it gets misleading. It looks nice, and I think would have been nice on the ipad. I cant rate any of the features, did look super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre anderson

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't charge. Really disappointed as I got this to take on a 6 week trip. I received the item 2 days before my trip and it seemed to work OK. 2 days into the trip I tried the keyboard but the battery was dead despite me charging it prior to leaving. I have not been able to get the keyboard to charge sence.
customer_reviews.author: Guilliam A Leger Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. I needed a keyboard for my iPad for a class I was taking at the time, and I had no issues. The class was 5 hours long, twice a week and I used the keyboard continuously during class. I did make a point of charging the battery after each class. I have also used the keyboard in a pinch when my work computer died and I needed to write long emails from my Android phone. After about a year however, the battery would no longer hold a charge. Still overall, I got good use out of it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a little over a week, so I really can't comment on battery life. Setup was easy. Instructions were clear. Pairing with iPad 4 was flawless. My one surprise is how heavy it is. Put the iPad in and you get some exercise! This isn't a complaint, just an ovservation. Be aware. The keyboard works great and is a big improvement over trying to "type" on the iPad. Not sure why I didn't think of getting this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worthwhile investment for aesthetics and protection.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this keyboard feels, reacts, and the battery lasts. Easy to pair, easy to use and charge, it's been a valuable asset so far. I feel comfortable transporting my iPad around in this case, and using it for school and work. Still new to iPads and such, but am ready to get used to it. All I can say, another great product from Alpatronix. Just waiting for a battery case for my pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it long enough to fully evaluate but so far I am thrilled with the case/keyboard. It just arrived yesterday and I charged it overnight. It works just fine today. It appears to be better than I even expected. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: norma Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Case For IPAD2
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST case I have ever bought for my IPad 2....not only stylish, but durable and the wireless keyboard is amazing. The keyboard stays put whether I'm using it or not, and the Bluetooth connects easy and quick, the battery last along time. I would recommend this product to all who are looking for a long term case for their IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Katt Walls

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, this turned into a dud. The first ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, this turned into a dud. The first keyboard had a spacebar that worked sometimes. Company said they would replace and very sorry for the problem. New keyboard typed some letters not others so a message looked lke ths bu i ws realy typin ths . So I returned everything. Thanks I will try another company.
customer_reviews.author: Normie

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard case exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was so easy to connect to my Ipad even though I am not usually very good with electronic devices. The keyboard has a nice touch and is easy to use. It is a little more cumbersome than my old one and a bit more difficult to stand up on my lap, but I am getting used to it. It fits my Ipad 4th Gen perfectly. Ordering was easy and delivery was very fast. I thought the price was quite reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: r2d2

customer_reviews.title: Great features and durability!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really liking this new case for my iPad. The Bluetooth keyboard is especially nice, with the ability to take it off and use it and the way that it connects to your iPad seamlessly for you to start typing emails, etc. The battery life has been no problem at all, I’ve only charged it once and haven’t had to do it again since. I do wish the spot the iPad sits it would be a little tighter. My iPad slips down slightly when it’s stood up, and makes it a little difficult to access buttons. The magnets work well and keep the case closed with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: TrudellC

customer_reviews.title: Almost TOO nice
customer_reviews.text: I am in the first week of using this keyboard and leather case. It is extremely nice...professional looking. My only comment is it is bigger/thicker than I expected. It ends up being almost an inch in depth versus something more molded to the ipad itself. It is nice the keyboard can be removed but it is also not if you putz around with your ipad in your lap. It is an adjustment for me, but all in all, it seems super nice and more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: linlowe

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself works fine. It connected right away and so far works as it should. However, the cardboard “frame” is thin and unstable. Unless you are on a stable flat surface, this will not hold itself up. Even so, the slightest movement will cause your iPad to fall flat as the keyboard needs to move only a very little bit for that to happen. And, there is not much holding to to prevent that from happening. The almost unnoticeable notches in the frame that are to hold the edge of the iPad from collapsing are a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Nowhere Man

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit iPad2
customer_reviews.text: Disregard the description when it says it’s iPad 2. I have an older iPad and bought this case so she could use the keyboard to help her with typing. The iPad to is too big to fit. I reached out to the company twice asking if I had received the wrong product, even though the box also said compatible with iPad 2 and never got a response after sending pictures. I even looked up my iPad model number to confirm it was an iPad 2. If you have a newer iPad it will fit. I can’t review how well the keyboard works since we never really got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Bult

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built, easy to set up; ad corrected (see detail)
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth configuration was easy and quick. I like that the keyboard attaches magnetically. "Fit and finish" are great. However, turns out that contrary to their ad, this unit (KX100) isn't appropriate for my iPad. The ad has been updated and they've been BEYOND helpful at getting me the correct replacement. Bravo, Alpatronix!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hornbach

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this keyboard since October '18 and so far I couldn't be happier. The touch is good, I've not had to recharge it once (I admittedly only use my iPad with this keyboard periodically, but sometimes forget to turn it off), and the reason I ordered this particular one had mostly to do with the ability to prop the screen on the keyboard at whatever angle I wanted (as I did with my previous one and loved). Because it's magnetic and detachable, I can shift it to whatever angle to rest the screen on that suits my position at the moment. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Slow to sync
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these purchased for my Ipad. It is the best out of a field of so-so options for a physical ipad keyboard. What I don't like is that it is often slow to sync with my Ipad so I often have to go to settings and sync it up manually or wait 20-30 seconds for it to sync up. Also, sometimes when I type it is slow to respond and what appears on the screen is much slower than my typing. The good part is the case and keyboard themselves. High quality and fits the ipad well.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Goo quality Leather case with excellent quality keyboard
customer_reviews.text: In general I am happy with the Leather case and keyboard, particularly the keyboard. I am not so happy with the case where you insert the Ipad because the Ipad slips quite a bit even after closing the Velcro strap. Problem is when it slips too far down the Ipad button is no longer totally accessible so I find myself pushing the ipad up to center it in the case. I will continue using it and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: jcs

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has a week magnets and only one very position.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, I like a lot, but it's only has one viewing position/ angle on where it can stand and only 2 magnets which are pretty weak to hold it in that position. I had to use Velcro to reposition where I needed for comfortable viewing position. It only has two magnets to hold the flap closed which are pretty weak as well. It does have plenty of protection for your pad though.
customer_reviews.author: arctic4me

customer_reviews.title: Value, quality, and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I give this case 5 stars for the value, quality, and outstanding customer service. The first unit they shipped me had a defect. It had two "W" keys! One of these covered the "S" key, and it still functioned properly, typing an "S". I felt bad asking to exchange it, as their margins must be low on this nice product. But they took care of me by shipping a new keyboard in a timely fashion. The case is a bit thicker than I would prefer, but it will certainly provide some protection should it be dropped. Overall it is a sturdy, well made and practical devise for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Good value; not for serious typing
customer_reviews.text: The case and keyboard look nice and are functional with my iPad 3. I've had no technical problems in over 6 months of use. However, this keyboard is not great for Word processing, extended typing pros, or fast error-free typing. The reason is that the keys, which are very low-profile, wobble too much on their levers. If you hit a key not exactly in the center, or if you press it a little too softly, it may still make a motion that feels like a proper keypress, but the keypress won't register. Disappointing, as I really needed a keyboard designed for serious typing, and this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Superfluoustic Expealidocious

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I price-shopped, read reviews, and was glad I chose this case. It is VERY substantial, not a flimsy one, so expect it to be a little heavier, although not really heavy.....just sturdy. I use it only for travel, so I am pleased with it being sturdier. The bright pink color helps me locate it quickly in my dark carryall.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and easy connection--loving it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great keyboard and case. I only opened it tonight, but it connected to my iPad almost immediately. It charged very quickly and has worked perfectly with everything I have tried it with (internet, email, Notability, etc.). I can see the concern about the keyboard slipping out of the case, but since I know that can happen, I will just make sure I carry it correctly. I wish it had a spot for me to put some identification. My last case had a small slot for ID, but that's all I could see to improve so far. Glad there were so many good reviews! That's what swayed me, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I received the item just a few days ago and have put my iPad in it and have used the blue tooth keyboard once. Everything was very easy to set up and use. I think it would be better if the slot for the iPad was sealed on the bottom to keep it in place and the Velcro strap be on the top and I would very much like a pocket for identification and a occasional notes I wish to carry with me in the iPad. Overall I am satisfied with the unit and don't think you can go wrong with it. It is the one I picked out of quite a research on iPad covers/carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Hanigan

customer_reviews.title: Not put together very well
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I had high hopes when this keyboard was delivered. It looks fantastic right out of the package and thought I had found a winner. Unfortunately, I plugged it in to charge for the very first time and when I unplugged it the metal connector popped out of the keyboard and it won't go back in. This basically makes it non-functional when the battery dies. Not sure if the one I got is an aberration or if they are all made poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: My iPad will not recognize the keyboard. It recognizes my airPods, my iPhone, my macBook and all other Bluetooth devices. The only one it will not recognize is the alpatronix keyboard. However, my iPhone does recognize it, so Alpatronix says that means it's not defective, and so they wash their hands of it and will do nothing further to help me pair it. They say my iPad must be defective, which is clearly BS because all other Bluetooth devices work perfectly with it.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is an all in one solution. Easy to connect to iPad. Removable keyboard. Cons: Keyboard Space key takes significant pressure to register a click (you often press it but the space doesn't register). Keyboard magnets are not that strong and the keyboard can easily dislodge. Does not work well if you want to keep this set-up in your lap and type while sitting on the couch. The iPad does not securely fold out and will easily move around or flop backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Launder

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and keyboard I purchased back in October. In December the number 3 key fell off. I tried to put it back in place with no sucess. The customer service department worked with me to solve the problem. After several attempts on my part, they told me to return it to them and they would see if they could fix it. Tdoay the told me my replacement keyboard is on the way. I just love companies like this.
customer_reviews.author: Popp13

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and features!
customer_reviews.text: Another good product from Alpatronix. The features of this product are what make it stand out. The detachable keyboard is a feature I find really great as well as being a user friendly one at that. The quality of the case it self is what makes this a 4 star. While I have not had the product all that long I do get the sense the case may show some wear faster than a more expensive product, but for the money I think this product is a great value with easy to use features... it's TOTALLY worth giving this case a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Adam D Jones

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We are using this with a new iPad 6th Generation. We like what we have seen so far, with a couple of minor issues. Using the entire case and keyboard is a bit bulky. The iPad cover can be used by itself, but its design is not conducive to that - access to key parts of the iPad is difficult, and it has no separate stand. The keyboard is fine, but it misses the chance to be special by not including a joystick-type capability.
customer_reviews.author: DJBIL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value. Less than half the price of just a cover from Apple. The leather is very nice, keyboard has a nice touch and has magnets to gently hold it in place, but be careful when moving folio about when it is open, the keyboard can slip out. Love that I can remove keypad when reading eBooks and that off/on button is large and easy to see abd use, much better than on a LogiTech keypad I have where the tiny switch is on the side. Fits a iPad 4 perfectly, could be just a bit wider opening to make getting to home button easier, but certainly not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: LindaSheron

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Case seems well made, no flaws in the stitching. Angle of the display can be adjusted as you need. Magnets hold the keyboard on so it can be easily moved. The original keyboard was defective (space bar didn't function properly). But a quick email and Rachel in their customer support had a replacement out to me in a couple days. No hassle %100 satisfied. Because it's a case and keyboard it makes your iPad 3x as thick but still easy to carry, Myself this iPad I only use at home. I don't like typing on the screen and I like the screen angle, so this does the trick nicely
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Initial case did not fit, but Alpatronics made it right and it's a great case.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The initial case sent to me did not fit the iPad 4th Gen at all. But Alpatronix contacted me and sent a replacement stating they had a bad batch of cases (looked like the case would fit the new 6th Gen iPad instead, so probably just mis-packaged). The replacement case fit perfectly. In the meantime I had purchased a case with a fixed keyboard. This one has a removeable keyboard which allows more flexibility in positioning of the keyboard and angle of the iPad when standing. Keyboard size is really nice for typing. The fixed keyboard case allowed rotation of the iPad which this does not. But overall, I think I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey @ Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Almost there, but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: I like the case and it’s functionality. It does have its hiccups though. The iPad doesn’t really want to “stand” at the angle it’s designed to so you have to wrestle with it. The magnets that hold the keyboard in place are not nearly strong enough. And last but not least the keyboard would’ve been so much better with something that could’ve angled it instead of lying flat as you type.
customer_reviews.author: KEYD2RYDE

customer_reviews.title: Battery disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I read through the reviews and was so excited to get this. It's really sleek and it looked so professional. But the battery wouldn't charge even when I charged it overnight. It wouldn't stay on and had connectivity issues, disconnecting when I did get it to work. I'm so dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good case for my ipad
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good case for my ipad, but there a few quirks that made me give it 4 stars. If you rest the ipad on the groove above the keyboard, it constantly falls out of the little groove when you tap the screen, and the flap is annoying if you're using the keyboard. If you slide the keyboard toward you and place the screen against it like in the picture, it's at an odd angle. I had a Kensington case which I loved, but I was too cheap to buy another when it wore out. Wish I had. I probably will before long.
customer_reviews.author: Kid at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!  Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this case and keyboard. It's great that you can easily take out the keyboard when reading a book and the cover flips back just fine to hold or you can put it on a table to stand on its own. The keyboard syncs up quickly and while small, is usable and I've gotten work done with it. When it's all together it is a bit heavy but definitely manageable! I recommend it if you're looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Quality Build and Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend headed to college. I love the quality of the case and the how the keys feel. I really like the bluetooth keyboard that detaches and has range to work with at a distance. I can't say I "love it" aka 5 stars, because we just purchased it. For the price, I like the warranty and quality of the build. Time will tell, but I'm hopeful. I actually might buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Product, GREAT! Constant emails, not so much...
customer_reviews.text: First, the good stuff. The iPad case is well made, attractive and works extremely well. You can set the iPad at several angles for your viewing pleasure. The keyboard is excellent! The keys are very responsive, and the Bluetooth mated immediately with my iPad. The magnets hold the keyboard in place well, and the magnets that hold the case closed are quite good as well. Now, what I don't like. Dear Alpatronix, please STOP with the email barrage to review your product, already. One email request to review a product is enough in my book. I'm rating your product 4 Stars instead of 5 solely because of the emails. You can stop now!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Case is good, keyboard is not.
customer_reviews.text: The case is great offers and has protected my iPad well for a few years now. The keyboard does not work well. The on/off switch is loose and will come on when you don’t realize it. Nearly every time I needed to use it, the battery had run down because the switch had come on at some point so I only used it while plugged in. After about 6 months the Bluetooth had stopped pairing with the iPad at all. I still have it in the case just for the extra protection but I’m looking for a replacement keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: I just need a replacement folio case for my wife's 1st generation Ipad; while I see there are a few choices out there but none was sure it would fit. And this one fits perfectly. So the bottom line is "best price, best fit", especially for the first generation Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great IPAD case that protects and allows for a Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the case and the protection it provides. The case is a bit heavy but that's the price of adding a fully functioning keyboard. The keyboard works great but does take a minute or two to be recognized every time you boot it up so be patient. Overall great product. The battery life on the keyboard is a but short but the fact that you can charge it while working is a plus. The only thing I find myself doing is reaching for a mouse because I forget I'm using a tablet! Also enjoy the way the case can hold up the screen for typing and video watching.
customer_reviews.author: Nick J. Martorano

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like about this case is that it feels a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this case is that it feels a bit clumsy to take my iPad out and put it back in. If you plan on leaving it in its case all the time, it's fine. I have to take my iPad out for various things (like using my iPad as a document camera), so it's a bit inconvenient for me. The keyboard is high quality and basically required for me to use a tablet without ripping my hair out though.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Having used this product for a few days after ordering, it is a game changing product that completely alters my I-Pad experience. The product design is intelligent; allowing for great angle of til, wrist pads, and a sturdy keyboard with a great key-action. The high quality of leather used in the product adds a depth of comfortableness. Other cases I have used, the leather has beeen scratchy and rough, which is not the case with this product. I am extremely happy with this product and would recommend it to others- even my own grandmother!
customer_reviews.author: WSeattleVaqueros

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new case with keyboard. I also have to give the company a high rating. When I received it - the keyboard was not working for some reason. I called their Customer Service department. The woman I spoke to on the phone was very helpful. We determined that the problem could not be fixed. They sent me out a replacement keyboard which paired right away. I have RA and find it much easier to type on the keyboard so that my wrists do not bend. Thanks Alpatronix for a great product and great service.
customer_reviews.author: RandD

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case. It feels great - you can tell it is a high quality case in your hands. I'm very impressed with the overall feel. It's slim and very professional looking, so I'm glad to have it to use to travel to client sites. The key board is responsive and the keys have a good feel to them. It holds the iPad snugly and all the appropriate parts are available to access (camera, etc.). It's a great accessory for the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great products d customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the product work great but their customer service is top notch! The first one I received was mislabeled so I sent them an email with pics of the problem, they sent out a new one by express and it was perfect. I am very pleased with the product as it works really great, but their customer service was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Zook

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pink color, very nice leather and stitching. The problem I had was the keyboard didn't stay up well because the groove it sits in is very shallow. Also because the keyboard is detachable and is held by magnets it would detach when opening, nearly falling on the floor a few times. The magnets should be much stronger. Plus it is fairly heavy because it is made of leather. The keyboard itself works great, pairs pretty easily. This keyboard case just wasn't the one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and case!
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard with my iPad; it's very easy to use, and my iPad had no trouble finding it via Bluetooth. I also like that it is lightweight and easy to remove my iPad from the case whenever I want to. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a dependable keyboard backed by exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have used this keyboard synchronized with my I-Pad for over 16 months. I found the keyboard and case very useful for data entry " on the go" as a in Home Physical Therapist. In that time, I have had many compliments on its user friendly functionality and stylish design. It recently had an issue with the charge port, but is in the process of being replaced, despite being outside of the 1 year warranty... so I advise purchasers to register the case to get an extra 1 year warranty for free! Looks like Alpatronix stands by it's products.
customer_reviews.author: DARREN W.

customer_reviews.title: quality product with details well thought
customer_reviews.text: - connects in a sec - compatible with my ipad - keyboard is good, handy - able to adjust at different angles - locks screen when lid is closed - keyboard separable- has magnetic pads to hold on to the case - good quality material - all buttons, charging pod etc accessible - little bulky
customer_reviews.author: Oguz Aytekin

customer_reviews.title: Breathe new life into my older Ipad 3!
customer_reviews.text: I had replaced my old IPad 3 with a IPad Pro with the Apple keyboard. I got used to the keyboard, so the old iPad ended up in the drawer. One day I left my IPad Pro at work and I found myself trying to use the old IPad. Although a little slow and grainy, I found I could still use it for what I needed to do. After receiving this keyboard, I was surprised to see how well it worked. Now, I find myself using the older IPad more often. Truly a great investment. Don’t get me wrong, it not like the Apple keyboard, but it works great for what I want it to do. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lazybulldog

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed at the bulk of this case. Can’t attach iPad without using bulky case. Keyboard ok but no simple way to attach without the bulky case. Too much bulk to pack around without always having to figure out a way to prop up so it can be used without case.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and usefulness
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard for my IPad. I have large fingers yet the keyboard is comfortable and easy to use. I like the fact that it’s magnetized to stick to the case. Connects very easily via Bluetooth. The case is well made and holds everything together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tramountanas

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product - Customer Service is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too small for my Ipad - will probably get a different one - Customer Service has contacted me and replaced the one I ordered & received with a different one at no charge! Customer Service is GREAT! I'm very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley May Mincer

customer_reviews.title: It's not about the money it's the functionality.
customer_reviews.text: So why not a 5? I don't like the fact that there is no REAL stop to keep the iPad semi vertical. It's too easy for it to come forward over the keys and the on/off switch needed to be located below the keyboard so it's not hidden for easy access. Now that I'm writing this I think I will send it back. One more thing is that the hole for the camera almost blocks the camera if you don't get it really snug in the holder. Good price, just not totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Tassinello

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, good material, holding up rather well. Just wish it had a slot / groove for the iPad to sit in so it wouldn't slide / flop about. I use two small pieces of Velcro to hold it in place while in use. Battery life is rather short compared to others I have owned but charges up rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Give me an unwanted Q!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to find a keyboard folio that had good value vs alleged good functionality. Unfortunately, I was wrong with this product. Every time I would type 1, 2, or use the Tab key, I would get a Q, and would have to go back, delete the characters multiple times and re-type. This made what I was working on extra tedious and more time-consuming than it already was. I wish I could say that I spend my hard-earned money on something that actually worked well. I dread having to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M Gray

customer_reviews.title: Alpatronix KX100 Case and Keyboard is the Missing Accessory for Your iPad 1-4
customer_reviews.text: Alpatronix keyboard case combo for the iPad 1-4 is attractive and solidly built. The stand works as shown to hold the iPad at an effective viewing angle. The keyboard (which is separate from the case) supplies enough friction to keep the iPad in place. (Without the keyboard, the iPad and case will sometimes slide flat.) Drawbacks--there is no storage sleeve or slot, so power cords and adapters must be packed separately. The space bar does not always register a touch, forcing you to watch your typing carefully to ensure spaces are inserted. And the case only comes in black. Still, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Perry W. Stout

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SO FAR!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for only two weeks, and I have absolutely no complaints. Although I have not completely mastered all of its functions per the instruction booklet it seems to work exactly as advertised. It's good. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: WayneWarmack

customer_reviews.title: iPads Are Better With Keyboards
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard completes my iPad. Composing anything on my iPad was a complete hassle. Now that I have a case with a Bluetooth keyboard, I can use my iPad for correspondence, or anything I want. The case appears to be a quality one, and the keyboard is fantastic. When it's attached to the case I have had to get used to hitting the space bar solidly, but when I detach it, there is no problem. It's just a matter of getting used to it. It works very well and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart C. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could go further with very little
customer_reviews.text: Great case with a very sleek design. The keyboard is very nice and the feel to it is quite nice. The quality seems quite good compared to other cases. The main issue I have with the case is that my iPad doesn't completely fit in place so the home button isn't always perfectly aligned with the notch. I think if they added some foam or fillers to be added in preferentially along with the case it would be perfect. Maybe some foam could help keep the iPad perfectly still within the case
customer_reviews.author: MOON

customer_reviews.title: and the keyboard connects instantly and easily via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard/case does everything it is supposed to do. The materials are solid, it fits the iPad well, and the keyboard connects instantly and easily via Bluetooth. It holds the iPad up for typing or Skyping at a good angle.The keyboard attaches with embedded magnets, which could be a bit stronger. It is easily removable if you want. The touch of the keyboard is very good, with slightly raised keys that give good tactile feedback, much better than using the screen. The case closes for protection. The keyboard goes a long time without recharging, then it connects via USB/Android cable. Overall, it was a very good choice, glad I got it! The price was quite fair, too.
customer_reviews.author: RobS.

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking black faux leather. Ipad slides in and out easily and doesn't fall over backwards even when typing with it on your lap in a reclining position. The keyboard has a nice feel to the typing. I can type pretty fast without a lot of mistakes in spite of the smaller keys. I bought this one after my belkin started falling apart after about 6 months. The belkin fell over constantly and the keys started falling off. This case is excellent. The downside is that its almost an inch wide but that is the reason it is not so flimsy. Money well spent. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great price and look
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the case and how it looked. The keyboard is easy to connect via Bluetooth with a on and off switch. The three positions for the iPad to tilt are notch in the case and keyboard. These notches work fine on a table, but not so much on your lap. The cover around the iPad offers good protection. The IPad can be used alone because the keyboard is separate. I had a case where the keyboard and IPad hinged like a laptop computer which I really like,but after two cases with broken hinges I was reddy to move on. For the price this is an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V

customer_reviews.title: Already love it!
customer_reviews.text: After researching these, I watched a very helpful video review (i think its the first review on here) and decided this is the one for me, even knowing the few limitations mentioned in the review. He's right, the grooves could be a little deeper, but i find if you fold over the flap it holds the ipad in place just fine. It does take a minute to get used to the small keyboard (i keep hitting the volume button instead of delete), but I literally took it out of the box an hour ago, so I will get used to it. The only time I really use the ipad is for traveling and this will be so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: washopper

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it’s not really pink
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the keyboard and how it works. The iPad stays up well. But the color in the photo isn’t what it looks like in person. I bought the “hot pink” one and it actually looks red in person. I’m very disappointed- had I known it wasn’t going to be the color I want I would have bought a different one. But it works fine so I guess I’ll keep it for now :/
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Zagg that quit working. I like this a lot better. The keyboard always works, unlike the Zagg that liked to disconnect a lot. This one protects the iPad a lot better and allows multiple ways to set it up with different viewing angles. The keyboard stays put with magnets, but is easily removable which is handy. Plus, the price is right but it looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: james appleby

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard was easy to sync and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in 2 days as was estimated. The case is attractive and my iPad2 fits very snuggly in it. The keyboard was easy to sync and works perfectly. The iPad also sits at nice angle while typing. The charger was a little difficult to insert into the iPad at first and it took a long time to charge it the first time. I left it plugged in overnight and it wasn't fully charged by the time I left for work the next morning. However, it was finished when I returned home from work. I don't use my iPad a ton, so hopefully the keyboard will keep its charge for a while. I would definitely recommend this case/keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: E. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Don't Depend on the Keyboard Working
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened it I was very pleased. Looks good, Leather nice and my ipad fit. The only thing is 2 days after I received it a letter from the keyboard fell off. I hadn't even used the keyboard yet. I found the letter put it back on and it fell off again. I have another keyboard so I will use it even though it doesn't quite fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a great price—now I know where to get my next iPhone case, Bluetooth speaker etc.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable value for what get. The leather case is very substantial and will definitely protect your iPad from scratches, dents and broken screens—far superior than what I ordered from Apple at a premium price. You should charge up the keyboard before using—only takes about an hour and you are good to go—Bluetooth connected flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is amazing. The keyboard is very responsive, love the button clicks. The battery last a LONG time. My iPad was a little bit of a tight fit, but fits very well. Keyboard feels nice, not too small. the keyboard itself also comes off the case, so you can move it around as you need. The case seems very sturdy, strong, and durable. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: First off, it's a very attractive case and it fits the iPad 4 perfectly. All the cutouts line up exactly. The keyboard paired in an instant and the feel of the keys is better than I thought it would be. The closure flap will probably take a bit of time to lay flat when the unit is in use, but I suspect it will happen in due course. Other than that, it is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect iPad case
customer_reviews.text: The Alphatronic iPad case with Bluetooth is almost perfect. The keyboard keys are very easy to use and has what I call soft clicks. The only reason I don't give it a full 5 star is that I don't think the battery life is long enough before needing to recharge. Other than that, it's everything I expected and more!
customer_reviews.author: TruthbKnown

customer_reviews.title: Returned for something thinner
customer_reviews.text: Found that this cover was a thick as my iPad 1's keyboard cover and equally as heavy - fit and finish were fine - but with much more review of possibilities I found something that's more to my liking for ~ $15 more .... I decided on the Belkin QODE FastFit - for fit and finish, absolute thinness, overall positive reviews and mostly... because despite all these other attributes the Belkin QODE FastFit also allows you to turn the unit into a tablet mode - and with no muss - no fuss the keyboard automatically shifts to the tablet keyboard and back again when you put it in a vertical typing mode - cool!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: It works well & is so convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since my iPad is a 4th generation, I could not replace the Zagg keyboard case I had originally. While this one is quite different, I’m very pleased with it. It’s nice to be able to remove the keyboard. Love that feature. My least favorite feature is that it doesn’t always stay in the propped position, especially if I’m using it on my lap. But I’m so delighted with the useability of the keyboard, I can over look the other. 😊 I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. George Ford

customer_reviews.title: Alpatronix KX 100 ipad keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the Alpatronix KX100 ipad keyboard case. It was recommended to me by a friend. It arrived on time, setup easily & was synced to my ipad & up & ready to go in 5 minutes. I love it, the keyboard & keys respond better than my HP laptop. I will def do business with Alpatronix again.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: It was a nice keyboard for a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: The battery worked for a few hours and then never took a charge again. It just powers down after a few seconds. I’ve tried additional charging cords outside of the one provided - and nothing. It was a nice keyboard for a couple hours. Good, quiet key action. Oh well. Link to purchase:
customer_reviews.author: ShopperX

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed. I have to purchase a new one that ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit true to my IPad. I am disappointed. I have to purchase a new one that fits my IPad. I looked around for a long time for a case that would work and this one, unfortunately, does not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very protective but heavy and keys aren't very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: The case has worked great so far, however you have to press kind of hard on the keys to make it type, especially the space bar. The keys for the ipad are closer together and not as sensitive compared to my mac computer's keyboard. I have a first generation ipad, and it fits really well in the case. However, I bought it hoping that it would be lighter than my computer to haul around campus, but it's almost the same weight.
customer_reviews.author: Calico Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Customer Service, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Secure part of case for IPad, easy instructions to follow for connecting keypad. Love the fact that the keyboard can be removed to use elsewhere as long as it is within range (of IPad), and the fact that the IPad case can be adjusted to the angle that works best for you. Can’t say enough about customer service. Rachel L worked with me regarding a problem I was having with the keyboard under warranty and when it couldn’t be resolved, immediately sent me a replacement with an envelope to return the original.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R Trump

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like a high quality product. Protects my iPad very well. The keyboard functions without a hassle and the battery last super long. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have had several of these already (but not this brand) and they break immediately after the first charge wears out (again, not this brand so far!). So while everything including service has been great, I reserve the right to update!
customer_reviews.author: frontallobedamage

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product but sticky space bar
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this iPad Keyboard except that the space tab doesn't work unless I hit it VERY hard...Hoping that over time it will work better - I have now typed daily using this iPad keyboard about 4 -5 hours total per day for the last 8 days and the space bar still does NOT work properly unless I hit it VERY hard...I think I might have gotten a bad space bar... I think this product as a whole is a good product but that I just got a bad keyboard... Is there anyway that you could fix this problem ???
customer_reviews.author: Vetgal

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a ClamCase which is considered the gold standard in bluetooth keyboard cases for iPads. I was given an original iPad and ClamCase no longer makes a case that will fit it so I had to look elsewhere and decided on the Alpatronix. Quite frankly the bluetooth works much better and faster than that in the ClamCase. I also like that it is much easier to see when the battery is running down on the Alpatronix than on the ClamCase. It is not as bulky and heavy as the ClamCase but that does make the stand more flimsy. Still, if you are concerned about price this is the way to go. For the money it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Stella B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as described, PO Box Return Address
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit an iPad2 properly. Difficult access to keys. Keyboard does not pair with iPad. Basically impossible to return because return address is a PO box. Don't waist your money!
customer_reviews.author: MDA

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for, with only a couple minor flaws. The keyboard is very comfortable to use and the key action has a really good feel. The unit holds my iPad original snugly and closes securely. The minor flaws are that there are no holes for the charger cable or for a headphone. I had to cut these out of the leather myself. This is annoying, especially for the charger because you have to wriggle the iPad out every time you want to recharge. Having made the alterations, it's a great product which I would highly recommend. I just hope Alpatronix takes note of these shortcomings and makes this fix.
customer_reviews.author: rick sparks

product_meta.title: Alpatronix KX100 Leather Folio Case with Removable Magnetic Bluetooth Wireless QWERTY Keyboard with Stand & Auto Wake/Sleep Function Compatible for iPad 2 & 3 & 4 (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackAlpatronix KX100 iPad premium synthetic leather folio protective Smart case with detachable Bluetooth wireless QWERTY keyboard compatible w/ the following Apple iPad models: [iPad 3 (Early 2012/3rd gen) iPad 4 (Late 2012/4th gen)] Overview: The KX100 is the smartest addition for your Apple iPad3, or Apple iPad4 (Retina display). an elegant case, The KX100 adds protection, and functionality to your iPad. The exterior is made of premium vegan Leather that protects your iPad. The removable keyboard makes typing on the iPad very easy, with a normal layout and larger keys. magnetically folds into a portfolio case protecting your iPad from scratches, stains and splashes. Easily setup your iPad the first time; afterwards pairing is automatic once the keyboard is turned on. comfortable, high quality and natural ABS keys provide a quick response and natural typing experience. Bluetooth keyboard can used with other Bluetooth-enabled devices. auto wake and sleep function. special keys for brightness, home, screen lock, volume and playback controls. turn your iPad into an ultra portable laptop. for extra portability, remove the magnetic keyboard to use the case on its own to hold files and folders. Bluetooth 3.0 ABS chiclet keyboard (higher quality than silicone keys) operating distance: 30 ft. working time: 100+ hrs. standby time: 800+ hrs. charging time: 1-2 Hrs. what's in the box? (Retail packaging): 1x premium folio leather iPad smart case 1x magnetic Removable rechargeable keyboard> 1x Micro USB charging cables> 1x user Manual> 1x Warranty card satisfaction guaranteed: We offer a 2-year hassle-free warranty to ensure long-lasting coverage, Power and protection!
feature_bullets: 4-in-1 Multi-functional Cover: KX100 is loaded with beneficial features. More than just the basic keys, the standard QWERTY keyboard includes iPad specific functions: brightness, slide-show, playback and volume controls. The keyboard is removable to offer you the ability to type anywhere. Tilt to your preferred viewing angle and use as a tablet stand. Your own personal laptop!

Intuitive QWERTY Bluetooth Keyboard: Wireless keyboard is detachable with no physical straps or Velcro. ABS chiclet keys allows for a natural, comfortable and responsive typing experience. Quickly pairs and syncs to your iPad for the first time and automatically connects after.

Auto Wake & Sleep Function: The tri-fold design secures your iPad and BT keyboard inside the case. The smart cover feature enables both auto wake and sleep functions when closing and opening the case.

Reliable & Long-Lasting Protection: The premium high quality PU (vegan) leather provides maximum protection for your iPad to prevent abrasions, splashes and dirt. Bluetooth signal has a range up to 30 feet. 100+ hrs. of working time and 800+ hrs. of standby time. Power-saving keyboard automatically shuts off when iPad is not in use.

What You Get: Alpatronix Folio Case, Bluetooth Keyboard, Micro USB Cable, User Manual & 1-Year Warranty (2-Year Extended Warranty is also available at no extra cost). Alpatronix is a family-owned and operated company with headquarters and customer service in Southern California. All Alpatronix products are designed in USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,313 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
